reference.title: Cover Page
reference.shortdesc: This table lists the general information about he techniques used for linking and conditional processing and other objectives of the project.

row.entry: Tasks
Details
Develop technical document
I have developed a technical document with sections described and include this cover page.
Information Types and elements
I have used a range of DITA information types in this project. I also included codeblocks, notes, tables and hazzardstatements where appropriate.
Hierarchial links
I have created hierarchial links using the DITA map and added collection-types of "family" with in. Each section and its children are linked using a relationship table within the main map.
Cross references
I have cross referenced the original PDF document using conref on all occasions, used xref to all external webpages referenced and used conkeyref to add all images.
Links to DITA and non-DITA resources
My linking includes links with DITA (conref, conkeyref, relationship tables) and non-DITA (local PDF and external weblinks) resources.
Images
All images are referenced using conkeyref.
Glossary
I have created a Glossary with the required terms alphabetically. The glossgroup is in alphabetical order itself and also recreated in the map file using topichead and the attribute navtitle.
Index

I have created an index withg more than 20 terms. 6 terms have been nested and 5 more have synonymous index terms. The Index has been created using conkeyref. It has been added using metadata to the "About this publication" topic.
Conditional Processing

I have created a conditional processing file called "filter-novice" and have added it to the profile settings. The devised schemes have multiple attributes. When turned on this filter will
On the Open Virtual Applicance topic: Remove "Application Stack" section as it is set to "novice"
On the Open Virtual Applicance topic: Include "Gateway" section as it is set to both "expert" and "novice"
On the Open Virtual Applicance topic: Flag "DataServer - Classic" section as it has the attribute and value props="prop1"
On the Open Virtual Applicance topic: Remove "DataServer - Distributed" section as it is set to "novice"
On the Network and port requirements topic: Flag "You must enable network..." section as it has the attribute and value props="prop1"
On the Environment sizing guidelines topic: Flag "The general design guidelines..." section as it has the attribute and value props="prop1"
On the Security topic: Flag "Secure communication and encription..." section as it has the attribute and value props="prop1"
On the Licence topic: Remove "Integration with IBM License Metric Tool" section as it is set to "novice"
Metadata
Metadata has been used throughout using Author, Copyright and Critddates in all topics and Prodinfo and Prodname in all maps.
